text: Cook {{noodles}} in boiling water until al dente. Drain and rinse to remove excess starch.
Heat {{olive_oil}} in a large skillet over medium heat. Add {{onion}} and {{sea_salt}}; cook until tender
Stir in the noodles and {{teriyaki_sauce}}. Cook until warmed through
Remove from heat. Toss with {{sesame_oil}} and {{sesame_seeds}}.
Serve topped with {{green_onion}} and extra sesame seeds if desired.
